pages.text: Fishing is $(#00a800)alleviating to your sanity$(), but another incentive to do it is the existence of $(#00a8a8)Aberrant Fish$(). These unusual creatures have mutations which make them disturbing - but also $(#00a800)valuable$(). Through your quest menu, you can sell $(#00a8a8)Aberrant Fish$() for profit.
Additionally, each time you catch one, $(#00a800)your insight will go up by one$().$(br2)
